Name: Luck Brooch
LongDescription: Enables the occasional use of a move with no PP consumption. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Togepi, Togetic, and Togekiss.  You can get a Luck Brooch at the Croagunk Swap Shop by swapping: a Togetic Wing, a Togetic Card, and a Happy Rock. That's the easy way!  An item with a ☆☆☆-rarity rating is very hard to get. It's beyond valuable!
